title: George Washington Carver National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Prairie Day 2011 Special Event   18 Photos  September 10, 2011 Celebrating life on the Missouri prairie during the late 1800s, when George Washington Carver was a child, this event includes exhibitors and activities for all ages.          Carver Day 2011 Special Event   22 Photos  Celebrating the 1943 establishment of the park, this event features guest speakers, music groups, exhibitors, and activities for all.          Carver Trail   28 Photos  These photos highlight some of the stops on the trail at George Washington Carver National Monument.            Prairie Day 2012 Special Event   23 Photos  Photographs of Prairie Day 2012.
